events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit at all and I want to return it.
The case has been classified under the refund cluster as the customer mentioned returning the product and requesting money back.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle the customer’s request regarding the return and refund of their jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you'd like a refund for the jacket you ordered. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in original packaging for the return process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still in its original packaging, I haven’t worn it or removed the tags.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund once the returned jacket is received. I will send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for your quick help! I appreciate the prepaid shipping label for the return.
The shipping label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
We wanted to check in to ensure you received the refund after returning your jacket. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Yes, I got the refund today. Thanks for resolving this quickly and for your help throughout the process!
The refund case has been closed successfully as the customer confirmed receipt of the refund and expressed satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey invitation was sent to the customer to gather feedback about their experience with the refund process.
